title: Vaaman is reconfigurable board with an Efinix Trion T120 FPGA and Rockchip RK3399
description: CrowdSupply recently featured the Vaaman which is a sophisticated computing board designed for academy or energy-efficient embedded applications due to its six-core ARM CPU and the Efinix Trion FPGA with customizable hardware acceleration. Vaaman’s design emphasizes speed and performance with a fast 300-MBps link between its FPGA and Rockchip RK3399 CPU with the followings specs: […]
